newsitem.title: REPUBLIC OF IRELAND: Ardagh yr pre-tax profit of 5.81 mln punts.
newsitem.headline: Ardagh yr pre-tax profit of 5.81 mln punts.

text.p: NOTE - Irish glass bottle manufacturer Ardagh Plc said on Wednesday that trading in the first few months of the current financial year was satisfactory.
The company said the very good weather in the summer of 1995 had boosted sales of beers, soft drinks and mineral waters in the earlier part of the last financial year.
The company said this contributed to its 5.6 percent increase in turnover for the year as a whole.
Ardagh said there had been an improvement in margins over the year to June 25, 1996, despite the pressures created by the continuing weakness in sterling.
"This improvement resulted primarily from the increase in volume sales and the achievement of productivity gains," the company said."

Ardagh said the new compressed air system, which had been installed during the year, was yielding some benefits in terms of quality and productivity as a result of more consistent operation of the bottle making machines.
